long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Watch list for eBIDLOCAL.com website. This extension enables you to replace the ebidlocal webpage with a watch list page. You are able to add ebidlocal item links to the watch list and monitor changes to bids.

To open a watch list you must be on a listing page. Either the all items page for the auction, or an individual item page. You'll seed "cgi-bin/mmlist.cgi" in the path.

To add items to a watch list you must open one a watch list. Once a watch list is open you can either paste links into the "Add Item" box and click "Add", or open a new page, the page of the item you want to watch, then in the extension click "Add Item".

Be sure to set your bidder id in the options menu by clicking "Go to Options" button in the extension.

Some features are:
* Auto refresh of watch list.
* Rows will be highlight in red when there's a change in data.
* If you are not the highest bidder the highest bidder id will be in bold red.

BETA:
This is a beta version of the watch list extension. Do not rely on it to have accurate data.
